nodes.priorLine: (use) Call box speaker and button.
nodes.lineToEdit: SECV remote attendance. (pause) You're on a recorded linequality and yeah liability. (pause) Alright. (pause) What do you need (pause) so you stay safe (pause) and this doesn't land in my lap?
nodes.revisedLine: SECV remote attendance. (pause) You’re on a recorded line—quality, yeah. Liability. (pause) Alright. What do you need (pause) so you don’t get hurt (pause) and I don’t end up owning it?
nodes.changeSummary: Made it more spoken and reactive; kept the recorded/liability framing and the speakers self-protective motive. | Reduced commas to one by splitting “liability” into its own sentence; cleaned encoding and punctuation while keeping cadence and meaning.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) Open the vestibule.
nodes.lineToEdit: I can't pop the vestibule (pause) just because you asked. (pause) I need the system to show (pause) an authorized onsite presence first. (pause) Otherwise it's my name (pause) on the why.
nodes.revisedLine: I can’t pop the vestibule by voice. (pause) I need the system to show onsite auth. (pause) Otherwise the “why” comes back to my name.
nodes.changeSummary: Shortened and hardened the refusal; kept requirement for authorized onsite presence and liability concern. | Shortened the first two beats to stay under 8 words while keeping the same meaning and cadence.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) Verify me.
nodes.lineToEdit: I can't verify identity over the speaker. (pause) I can check the schedule for your name. (pause) That's all. (pause) It keeps the paper happy.
nodes.revisedLine: Over the speaker? I cant verify you. (pause) I can check the schedule for your name. (pause) Thats it. (pause) Keeps the paper off my desk.
nodes.changeSummary: More conversational and defensive; preserved the limit to schedule lookup and paperwork pressure.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) Am I scheduled?
nodes.lineToEdit: Yeah. (pause) Youre scheduled today under OLEA closeout. (pause) Activity. (pause) Thats your name in the system, anyway. (pause) Anything past that gets sticky for me.
nodes.nextLine:
Scheduled doesn't flip you to onsite. (pause)
Onsite is the box with a timestamp. (pause)
Something I can point to later. (pause)
Without it I'm not opening a door. (pause)
Then explaining how you got hurt. (pause)
With no record.
nodes.revisedLine: Yeah. (pause) Youre in the system today under OLEA closeoutactivity. (pause) Thats what it shows. (pause) Anything past that gets sticky for me.
nodes.changeSummary: Trimmed formality and made it sound like reading a screen; kept OLEA closeout and reluctance to go further.

nodes.priorLine: Yeah. (pause) Youre scheduled today under OLEA closeout. (pause) Activity. (pause) Thats your name in the system, anyway. (pause) Anything past that gets sticky for me.
nodes.lineToEdit:
Scheduled doesn't flip you to onsite. (pause)
Onsite is the box with a timestamp. (pause)
Something I can point to later. (pause)
Without it I'm not opening a door. (pause)
Then explaining how you got hurt. (pause)
With no record.
nodes.revisedLine: Being scheduled doesn't light you up onsite. (pause) I need the onsite box and a timestamp. (pause) Something I can point to later. (pause) No timestamp, no door. (pause) I'm not writing the injury report. (pause) With nothing in the log.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept the same gate (onsite timestamp) but made it more pressured and personal-to-liability. | Shortened each beat to 8 words or fewer, cleaned encoding, and split the last clause into two beats while keeping meaning. Kept commas to one.

nodes.priorLine: (multiple) ((ask) Unlock it anyway.) ((ask) Unlock it anyway.)
nodes.lineToEdit: I can't. (pause) If I unlock it on a call, (pause) the log tags me as authorization. (pause) I don't have clearance for that.
nodes.nextLine: If there's a clean onsite record, sure. (pause) Right now it's just a voice. (pause) On a speaker. (pause) And for what it's worth you've been polite. (pause) Thanks.
nodes.revisedLine: I can't. (pause) If I pop it here, log tags me. (pause) It pins the authorization on me. (pause) I don't have that clearance.
nodes.changeSummary: Tightened and made it sound like a real refusal; preserved the log/authorization/clearance reason. | Shortened the middle sentence and split it into two beats to keep each beat under 8 words, while keeping the single comma and the same meaning.

nodes.priorLine: I can't. (pause) If I unlock it on a call, (pause) the log tags me as authorization. (pause) I don't have clearance for that.
nodes.lineToEdit: If there's a clean onsite record, sure. (pause) Right now it's just a voice. (pause) On a speaker. (pause) And for what it's worth you've been polite. (pause) Thanks.
nodes.revisedLine: If there’s a clean onsite record, sure. (pause) Right now you’re just a voice on speaker. (pause) For what it’s worth—thanks for staying polite.
nodes.changeSummary: Smoothed into more natural speech while keeping the condition (clean onsite record) and the small courtesy. | Shortened the second and third beats to 8 words max, kept only one comma overall, and preserved the original meaning and cadence.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) What exactly do I need from Records?
nodes.lineToEdit: Temporary Presence Receipt, or whatever its called now.
nodes.nextLine: It needs your name and date. (pause) Activity type too. (pause) The site field must read 'onsite'. (pause) Not 'expected'. (pause) Once it's in the file, (pause) I can hit the vestibule door. (pause) No making you up in the log.
nodes.revisedLine: Temporary Presence Receipt. (pause) Or whatever theyre calling it now.
nodes.changeSummary: Minor tweak for cadence; kept the exact item name and the aside.

nodes.priorLine: Temporary Presence Receipt, or whatever its called now.
nodes.lineToEdit: It needs your name and date. (pause) Activity type too. (pause) The site field must read 'onsite'. (pause) Not 'expected'. (pause) Once it's in the file, (pause) I can hit the vestibule door. (pause) No making you up in the log.
nodes.nextLine: Used to be you walked there. (pause) To the Records window. (pause) Now its: find whoever has Records authority. (pause) Or find the stamp. (pause) Or follow pneumatic tube instructions. (pause) They act like Records still has staff. (pause) Im not joking. (pause) Thats the procedure.
nodes.revisedLine: Needs your name and date. (pause) Activity type too. (pause) And the site line has to say 'onsite'. (pause) If it says 'expected' I can't use it. (pause) Once it's filed, I hit the vestibule door. (pause) I'm not making you up in the log.
nodes.changeSummary: Collapsed the checklist into spoken shorthand; preserved required fields, the onsite/expected distinction, and the no-fabrication stance. | Shortened the long beat by tightening phrasing, removed extra commas, and kept the same requirements and cadence with the pauses.

nodes.priorLine: It needs your name and date. (pause) Activity type too. (pause) The site field must read 'onsite'. (pause) Not 'expected'. (pause) Once it's in the file, (pause) I can hit the vestibule door. (pause) No making you up in the log.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) So: get marked onsite. Then call you.
nodes.lineToEdit: Yeah. (pause) Get the onsite mark, then call me. (pause) I can't move a door without paper. (pause) It says you're here.
nodes.nextLine: Next step: get marked onsite by Recordsbecause the facility recognizes you once it can file you.
nodes.revisedLine: Yeah. (pause) Get the onsite mark. Then call me. (pause) Need paper: you're here. Can't move a door.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) Confirm my schedule details. I need a trail.
nodes.lineToEdit: What Im seeing: Field Systems Specialist, OLEA. (pause) Closure verification. (pause) Staged shutdown prep. (pause) Today through end-of-day. (pause) Tagged subject to onsite confirmation. (pause) That tag is the only reason. (pause) I can even say this much.
nodes.nextLine: I can't read personal schedule details. (pause) Not to an unverified caller. (pause) Get a Presence Receipt from Records marked onsite. (pause) I can attach it to that event. (pause) Then it's treated as ops.
nodes.revisedLine: What I'm seeing, Field Systems Specialist—OLEA. (pause) Closure verification. (pause) Staged shutdown prep. (pause) Today through end-of-day. (pause) And it's tagged 'subject to onsite confirmation.' (pause) I'm only saying this much.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept all schedule fields but made it sound like a stressed read-off with a liability hedge. | Shortened beats to 8 words or fewer, limited commas to one, and tightened the final rationale while keeping the same meaning and cadence.

nodes.priorLine: What Im seeing: Field Systems Specialist, OLEA. (pause) Closure verification. (pause) Staged shutdown prep. (pause) Today through end-of-day. (pause) Tagged subject to onsite confirmation. (pause) That tag is the only reason. (pause) I can even say this much.
nodes.lineToEdit: I can't read personal schedule details. (pause) Not to an unverified caller. (pause) Get a Presence Receipt from Records marked onsite. (pause) I can attach it to that event. (pause) Then it's treated as ops.
nodes.revisedLine: I can't share personal schedules with unverified callers. (pause) Get a Presence Receipt from Records marked onsite. (pause) I'll attach it to that event. (pause) Then it's ops.

nodes.priorLine: (persuade) Im OLEA. This is closure. You can rely on the work order.
nodes.lineToEdit: I'm looking at the work order. (pause) It tells me you're scheduled. (pause) Over this speaker I can't act. (pause) It doesn't give me anything usable. (pause) I need Records to tag you onsite. (pause) Then the work order has somewhere to land.
nodes.nextLine: Once Records flips you to onsite (pause) I can do doors and cameras (pause) and timed unlocks. (pause) Until then (pause) I'm stuck on the phone (pause) and I'm about out of bandwidth.
nodes.revisedLine: Yeah. I’m looking at the work order. (pause) It shows you’re scheduled. (pause) But I can’t act on it here. (pause) I need Records to tag you onsite. (pause) Then the work order has somewhere to land.
nodes.changeSummary: Made it more immediate and less formal; kept the work order limitation and the Records-onsite requirement. | Split long beats into shorter lines, removed extra comma, and kept the same meaning and cadence with additional pause breaks.

nodes.priorLine: I'm looking at the work order. (pause) It tells me you're scheduled. (pause) Over this speaker I can't act. (pause) It doesn't give me anything usable. (pause) I need Records to tag you onsite. (pause) Then the work order has somewhere to land.
nodes.lineToEdit: Once Records flips you to onsite (pause) I can do doors and cameras (pause) and timed unlocks. (pause) Until then (pause) I'm stuck on the phone (pause) and I'm about out of bandwidth.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) Unlock the guard shack interior.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) What do you mean system indicates?
nodes.lineToEdit: I mean a record I can hang (pause) my action on: name; date; (pause) activity type; site designation set to onsite; (pause) plus a Records authority marker.
nodes.nextLine: Im not looking for your face. (pause) Im looking for the box. (pause) It puts responsibility where it belongsRecords. (pause) In the log. (pause) Somewhere that isnt me.
nodes.revisedLine: I mean. (pause) A record to hang the unlock on. (pause) Name date activity type. Site set to onsite. (pause) And a Records authority marker.

nodes.priorLine: I mean a record I can hang (pause) my action on: name; date; (pause) activity type; site designation set to onsite; (pause) plus a Records authority marker.

under your name.

nodes.lineToEdit: I help when theres paper. Cant be it.
nodes.revisedLine: Give me paper. I can help. (pause) Without it I can’t be the one.
nodes.changeSummary: More natural and defensive; preserved the boundary that help requires paperwork. | Removed commas to meet the max_commas limit; kept meaning and cadence.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) I found old badges and a sign-in sheet. Does that help?
nodes.lineToEdit: Like any blank form, it takes a mark.
nodes.nextLine: It wont authorize you. (pause) But it gives you something on record. (pause) Later you can say: I followed procedure. (pause) Sort of.
nodes.revisedLine: Blank forms don’t do much until marked.
nodes.changeSummary: Made it sound like offhand, practical speech; kept the same point about making a record. | Condensed the line from 12 to 7 words while keeping the same meaning.

nodes.priorLine: Like any blank form, it takes a mark.
nodes.lineToEdit: It wont authorize you. (pause) But it gives you something on record. (pause) Later you can say: I followed procedure. (pause) Sort of.
nodes.nextLine: If you can get a Records marker (pause) onto one of thosestamp or kiosk or whatever(pause) then I can treat you as accountable (pause) and run doors.
nodes.revisedLine: It won’t authorize you. (pause) But it’s something on paper. (pause) Later you can still say you signed in. (pause) Sort of.
nodes.changeSummary: Less preachy, more pragmatic; preserved the lack of authorization and the value as a minimal trail. | Shortened the third beat to 8 words by replacing “at least” with “still,” keeping the meaning intact.

nodes.priorLine: It wont authorize you. (pause) But it gives you something on record. (pause) Later you can say: I followed procedure. (pause) Sort of.
nodes.lineToEdit: If you can get a Records marker (pause) onto one of thosestamp or kiosk or whatever(pause) then I can treat you as accountable (pause) and run doors.
nodes.nextLine: Understood.
nodes.revisedLine: If you can get a Records marker (pause) onto one of those stamp or kiosk things (pause) then I can treat you as accountable (pause) and run doors.
nodes.changeSummary: Minor tightening; preserved the Records marker requirement and resulting ability to run doors. | Removed extra commas by swapping the list for “stamp or kiosk things,” kept pauses and meaning intact, and cleaned the stray character.

nodes.priorLine: (persuade) Im OLEA. Im collecting closure artifacts. You can note me as present.
nodes.lineToEdit: I can log that you called. (pause) I cant log you onsite from this box.
nodes.nextLine: That onsite flag comes from Records. (pause) Or the kiosk workflow. (pause) Its database fields. (pause) Not something I can take on faith. (pause) Over audio.
nodes.revisedLine: I can log that you called. (pause) I cant log you onsite from this box.
nodes.changeSummary: Already clipped and defensive; kept as-is.

nodes.priorLine: I can log that you called. (pause) I cant log you onsite from this box.
nodes.lineToEdit: That onsite flag comes from Records. (pause) Or the kiosk workflow. (pause) Its database fields. (pause) Not something I can take on faith. (pause) Over audio.
nodes.nextLine: If I mark you present without it (pause) the audit trail points at me. (pause) I'm only cleared to respond (pause) to a record, not create one.
nodes.revisedLine: That onsite flag has to come from Records. (pause) Or the kiosk workflow. (pause) Its database fields. (pause) Im not taking it on faith over audio.
nodes.changeSummary: More spoken, less formal; preserved the source of the onsite flag and refusal to rely on audio.

nodes.priorLine: That onsite flag comes from Records. (pause) Or the kiosk workflow. (pause) Its database fields. (pause) Not something I can take on faith. (pause) Over audio.
nodes.lineToEdit: If I mark you present without it (pause) the audit trail points at me. (pause) I'm only cleared to respond (pause) to a record, not create one.
nodes.revisedLine: If I mark you present without it, (pause) the audit trail points straight at me. (pause) Im cleared to respond to a record(pause) not create one.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept the same audit/liability point; made cadence more stressed and conversational.

nodes.priorLine: (ask) Fine. Minimum requirement?
nodes.lineToEdit: Minimum: name/date/type; site=onsite; Records authority marker.
nodes.nextLine: Stamp is best. (pause) Kiosk receipt works. (pause) Handwritten note: people love it. (pause) It falls apart fast if anyone pushes.
nodes.revisedLine: Minimum? Name. Date. Type. (pause) Site’s set to onsite. (pause) And a Records authority marker.
nodes.changeSummary: Turned the list into natural speech; preserved all minimum fields. | Removed extra commas by splitting “Name, date, type” into short sentences; corrected the apostrophe in “Site’s.”

nodes.priorLine: Minimum: name/date/type; site=onsite; Records authority marker.
nodes.lineToEdit: Stamp is best. (pause) Kiosk receipt works. (pause) Handwritten note: people love it. (pause) It falls apart fast if anyone pushes.
nodes.revisedLine: Stamp is cleanest. (pause) Kiosk receipt works. (pause) Handwritten notepeople love it. (pause) It falls apart the second anyone pushes.
nodes.changeSummary: More conversational and slightly cynical; kept the same hierarchy (stamp/kiosk/note) and fragility warning.

nodes.priorLine: (multiple) ((leave) End call.) ((leave) End call.) ((leave) End call.)
nodes.lineToEdit: Okay. (pause) Call me back when you're marked onsite. (pause) I know you're boxed in right now. (pause) Stay safe.
nodes.revisedLine: Okay. (pause) Call me back when youre marked onsite. (pause) I know youre boxed in right now. (pause) Watch yourself.
nodes.changeSummary: Kept the same instruction and acknowledgement of being boxed in; made the safety line more spoken.
